## FSPE Conclusions


.pull-right[
FSPE scheme again
]

1. 8:2 FTAC can react w/ protein thiols

--

2. FSPE selectively enriches PFAS modified peptides

--

3. PFAS modifications occur outside of predicted regions

4. PFAS modification decrease protein stability
